name: Mike Bloomberg
tweet: .@SecYellen, @Lagarde, & @McGuinnessEU are exemplary climate leaders. I'm grateful they were able to join us to share their insights at today's event, and for their support of @FSB_TCFD climate reporting guidelines.  https://t.co/ogkIEyAta6

name: Mike Bloomberg
tweet: Cities and businesses hold the key to defeating climate change. And the more the federal government does to help them take action, the faster we can make progress.

name: Mike Bloomberg
tweet: Thank you to @POTUS for organizing the #LeadersClimateSummit. We have a chance as a country to demonstrate what strong leadership looks like—which isn't only about setting ambitious goals. It's also about working as a team to meet them.  https://t.co/PIdKLjLo2k

name: Mike Bloomberg
tweet: At @bloombergdotorg, we’re big believers in the power of public art to inspire action & build community — & that’s exactly what @CityofCamdenGov is doing. The city is reclaiming public spaces & revitalizing them. We're glad to support this inspiring work.  https://t.co/rE54gn3J9I  https://t.co/oZAD1HfoqD

name: Mike Bloomberg
tweet: My statement on the Biden-Harris administration's new climate goal:  https://t.co/20OkIMXwD8 #EarthDay  https://t.co/Sm6Wof7GUd

name: Mike Bloomberg
tweet: Thanks to leadership from @TimmermansEU, @VDombrovskis & @McGuinnessEU, the EU's new climate law and sustainable finance package will help reduce carbon emissions towards a net-zero economy.  Nations must join forces to go farther and faster at @POTUS' #ClimateLeadersSummit.

name: Mike Bloomberg
tweet: For four years, when Washington was trying to drag us backward, mayors stepped up to lead on climate change. Now, the federal government needs to empower local leaders, so they can build on this progress reducing emissions and creating jobs.  https://t.co/qJLzGXnBoE

name: Mike Bloomberg
tweet: Fighting climate change is good for our planet and good for business — and, today, @SecYellen demonstrated incredible leadership in support of this idea by embracing @FSB_TCFD. Looking forward to the work that follows.  https://t.co/JmlUA6w7g4

name: Mike Bloomberg
tweet: We’re in a pivotal moment ahead of #COP26, and launching the Glasgow Financial Alliance for Net Zero is a critical step to speed the #RacetoZero carbon emissions.  This progress wouldn't be possible without the leadership of @MarkJCarney, @TopNigel and the financial sector.

name: Mike Bloomberg
tweet: The jury has spoken, but this does not close the case on the life of George Floyd. The work of building a more racially equitable and just nation is up to all of us - and I remain fully committed to it.

name: Mike Bloomberg
tweet: One of the most powerful tools we have to fight climate change is market transparency - and today @Google is adding more firepower. By supporting @FSB_TCFD, they will help investors and companies better understand climate-related risks and opportunities.

name: Mike Bloomberg
tweet: The pandemic has created new challenges and opportunities in cities around the world. @BloombergDotOrg’s 2021 Global Mayors Challenge will help accelerate 50 of the 631 most innovative solutions submitted from cities to emerge from the pandemic stronger.  https://t.co/CxIakelEAn  https://t.co/R3jJ4ptlDt

name: Mike Bloomberg
tweet: For too long, top colleges have been too hard to attend—and get through—for first-generation and lower-income students. Hopefully, this gift is the start of a new era, where all talented students can thrive at @Princeton and other great institutions:  https://t.co/XWyQAFVPjQ

name: Mike Bloomberg
tweet: As @Princeton continues to raise the bar for what college access and success should mean, our family and @BloombergDotOrg look forward to seeing this new center help even more students make it to and through college.

name: Mike Bloomberg
tweet: At @BloombergDotOrg, we've spent years ensuring talented first-gen, lower-income students apply to & enroll in schools they deserve to attend. I'm glad to share the Emma Bloomberg Center at @Princeton will expand access to opportunity in higher ed.  https://t.co/vCQsPtNAnQ

name: Mike Bloomberg
tweet: This week’s @BloombergDotOrg Follow The Data podcast takes us out to sea—with @Ian_Urbina & our own @MelissaW_Enviro discussing the Outlaw Ocean Project's work to ​uncover the environmental threats & ​human rights abuses taking place at sea.  Listen here:  https://t.co/K8SipyruUo  https://t.co/cOTZgYjQXZ

name: Mike Bloomberg
tweet: My statement on the passing of Vartan Gregorian:  https://t.co/STaqTKfoJx  https://t.co/W4O7xyZ0PF

name: Mike Bloomberg
tweet: .@Carbonmapper — a @bloombergdotorg partner — announced it will send a satellite to space that will identify methane and carbon super emitters around the world.  This will provide the kind of accountability we need to make real progress on climate change.  https://t.co/03Sn9OWYz5

name: Mike Bloomberg
tweet: More than half the world lives in a city, which means mayors have more responsibility than ever.  Through the Partnership for Healthy Cities, we're working with them to end this pandemic & build a playbook on how to stop the next one before it starts. @WHO @VitalStrat #VitalTalks  https://t.co/yS3vtJKfEx

name: Mike Bloomberg
tweet: Great to talk with @GinaMcCarthy46 and @anthawilliams about the urgent need to do more to both fight climate change and create jobs at the #BNEFSummit.  https://t.co/C3ABe9lsPW

name: Mike Bloomberg
tweet: We're expanding our partnership with America's four historically Black medical schools as they ramp up mobile vaccine operations.  Increasing equitable access to vaccines for communities who need it most is more important than ever.  https://t.co/VVxSB8rjlj

name: Mike Bloomberg
tweet: Leadership from American cities, states, and businesses has set the groundwork for increased climate ambition.  Now is the time to set a bold new U.S. target of 50% reductions by 2030.  New analysis from @AmericaIsAllIn shows us it's possible.  https://t.co/iFXbXTBqyn  https://t.co/Dchmz1qt4h

name: Mike Bloomberg
tweet: After years of nothing but talk from Washington, @POTUS is taking some important first steps to address gun violence—from clamping down on ghost guns to providing cities with more resources to combat this deadly epidemic. Now, it’s the Senate’s turn to act.

name: Mike Bloomberg
tweet: We created the Climate Finance Leadership Initiative to help drive capital to clean energy, especially in emerging markets. This new report shows how we can do more of that, faster.  https://t.co/j4TG9BMkAB  https://t.co/emSJ0m0fH7

name: Mike Bloomberg
tweet: .@Everytown calls homemade ghost guns the "fastest growing gun safety threat" — and for good reason: they are just as deadly as other guns but even easier to get and even harder to trace.  That's why we need to get them off of our streets:  https://t.co/qx6yYifZIa

name: Mike Bloomberg
tweet: I’m extending my offer to triple match all contributions made to @everytown before midnight tonight ET. The survivors and volunteers working tirelessly to end gun violence have made so much progress - and they're just getting started.   Donate here:  https://t.co/TMIYRwtkDJ

name: Mike Bloomberg
tweet: This week, @BloombergDotOrg released the 100th episode of our podcast, #FollowTheData. name: Mike Bloomberg
tweet: In response to the greatest challenge to public education in generations, the Biden administration needs to get kids back in the classroom without delay—and push states to run universal summer school.  https://t.co/CwFSyi9RNw  https://t.co/RtHq8qi4qL

name: Mike Bloomberg
tweet: The climate crisis has real financial implications - so it's encouraging to see that asset managers are joining the #RacetoZero and making commitments to achieve a net zero, resilient future.  https://t.co/mn2VsCdWJq  https://t.co/qHwcY6uSYs

name: Mike Bloomberg
tweet: We need #MoreThanThoughtsAndPrayers. We need action to bring an end to the gun violence devastating our country.  That's why I'm triple matching all donations to @Everytown. Together, let's end this crisis:  https://t.co/gunpC1E0E7   https://t.co/FskP7mcSuf

name: Mike Bloomberg
tweet: The American people overwhelmingly want common sense gun laws - and the more Americans who stand up and make their voices heard, the better chance for action.   That's why I'm triple matching all donations to @Everytown this week. Donate here:  https://t.co/bhQpqXa6k8

name: Mike Bloomberg
tweet: If @JapanGov doubles its renewable energy commitment before #COP26, it would send a powerful sign to the world and jumpstart green recovery.  We can go farther, faster when we all accelerate our transition to renewables.  https://t.co/vH9HuvKqVW  https://t.co/5MXCzNZ9Kl

name: Mike Bloomberg
tweet: Burning coal is the single biggest contributor to climate change.   @EurBeyondCoal ​continues to lead on progress, officially retiring 50% of coal plants across Europe​ and showing how other countries can step up toward a cleaner, ​healthier future.  https://t.co/opSjBVrTrU  https://t.co/Lyr2Cb2czp

name: Mike Bloomberg
tweet: .@Marty_Walsh has a track record of getting things done as mayor of Boston - and he's been fighting for working men and women his whole career. Great to see him confirmed as Labor Secretary.  https://t.co/u2QIFwRM5E

name: Mike Bloomberg
tweet: The UK can lead the way on climate change.  The British government should incentivize global clean-energy investment - and partner with the market economy in the lead-up to #COP26.  There’s no time to waste.  https://t.co/LAP3loTyJr

name: Mike Bloomberg
tweet: Through @CollegePoint, our team at @BloombergDotOrg helps talented students with limited resources attend top universities. This year, we need your help finding ones who are ready to change the world: Do you know a student who might qualify? Nominate them:  https://t.co/cFBls0BdSA

name: Mike Bloomberg
tweet: We’re facing big, complex challenges - like helping to reduce inequities in the health care system, preventing gun violence, & investing in women’s economic development. @BloombergDotOrg is following the data - and forming partnerships - to make progress:  https://t.co/AvYppmw9o4  https://t.co/HiEsx4E9bN

tweet: The U.S. is facing major health challenges, from inequities to the opioid & obesity crises. @DrJoshS @JohnsHopkinsSPH is a trusted partner on our overdose, @AmericanHealth & @BHCityLeaders COVID-19 work - and would be a great pick to lead @US_FDA.  https://t.co/lJfh4BIPM1

name: Mike Bloomberg
tweet: It’s clear the vaccine distribution has not been equitable. To help fix that, @BloombergDotOrg & the @usmayors are working together to ensure Americans who need vaccines get them, especially people in communities that have suffered the most from the virus.  https://t.co/u63r9h1U3k

name: Mike Bloomberg
tweet: My statement on last night's shooting in Atlanta:  https://t.co/Mfxjej9IVg

name: Mike Bloomberg
tweet: The federal government has already proven it can get a lot done on its own—but on everything from climate change to health care, the Biden administration will be able to go further working hand-in-hand with cities, even in the reddest states:  https://t.co/GujHlCFUeV

name: Mike Bloomberg
tweet: For far too long, zip code, skin color, & a parent's income have determined a child’s education—& the pandemic has exacerbated those inequities. Increasing college access for all remains a priority for us at @BloombergDotOrg. See how in our Annual Report:  https://t.co/BhpNN59cgd  https://t.co/PcRjHmUOvP

name: Mike Bloomberg
tweet: When we reach net zero emissions, we'll all be able to breathe easier - but the U.S. still has a ways to go.  We all have a role to play in achieving net zero carbon emissions - so it's crucial businesses, cities, regions, & investors join the #RacetoZero.  https://t.co/iVwee8gGwQ

name: Mike Bloomberg
tweet: 42% of Americans have gained "pandemic pounds" — and obesity is the second-leading risk factor for death from COVID-19.  Without urgent action, the number of deaths related to unhealthy diets will continue to rise.  https://t.co/z1weXvkDii

name: Mike Bloomberg
tweet: The way we consume arts and culture has been significantly disrupted over the last year, but the role it plays in our lives has never been more important.  Read about how @BloombergDotOrg has been helping the creative sector survive throughout this crisis:  https://t.co/7kKKEZD74y  https://t.co/yMr2xUXGr5

name: Mike Bloomberg
tweet: I’ve often said, “If you can’t measure it, you can’t manage it.”  Our partnership with @MayorofLondon to support high-quality air sensors and make @Breathe_London air pollution data available to Londoners in real-time will help do exactly that.  https://t.co/fRLqPNJS0B

name: Mike Bloomberg
tweet: Despite all that we faced in 2020, I’m more optimistic than ever about our ability to tackle the big challenges we face.  @BloombergDotOrg is helping mayors expand local governments’ creative capacity and push the boundaries of civic innovation.  https://t.co/HloxPVBEja  https://t.co/N9ZfpK3uMa

name: Mike Bloomberg
tweet: As a proud American and Jew, I'm horrified that the number of anti-Semitic attacks in the US surged to a 40-year high.  On March 16, local leaders will convene for the Mayors Summit Against Anti-Semitism. Register here:  https://t.co/nPgqvi7cFX  https://t.co/X2qhy4pjAX

name: Mike Bloomberg
tweet: .@BloombergDotOrg is ensuring better, longer lives for the greatest number of people. name: Mike Bloomberg
tweet: For years, @BloombergDotOrg has worked to reduce noncommunicable diseases & preventable deaths from tobacco use, obesity, road traffic crashes, & more. name: Mike Bloomberg
tweet: Investing in a green recovery is an opportunity we can’t afford to miss.  Now is the time to rebuild a healthier, more sustainable global economy – with new jobs, in clean energy.  We need to do more, faster.  https://t.co/esVCGE8J1p

name: Mike Bloomberg
tweet: Today the House passed two bills that would require background checks on gun sales. Call your Senators & demand they do the same.  The Charleston loophole — which allows gun sales without background checks — has killed too many Americans for too long.  https://t.co/yu8FWqC9vf

name: Mike Bloomberg
tweet: As we work to recover & rebuild from the pandemic, we have an opportunity to accelerate the transition to clean energy.   From retiring coal plants to supporting action in cities, learn how @BloombergDotOrg is fighting climate change in our Annual Report:  https://t.co/8FgeUX8ejo

name: Mike Bloomberg
tweet: As @PattiHarris writes in her annual letter, @BloombergDotOrg hasn't only doubled down on existing commitments, but expanded & pivoted to new partnerships & goals. name: Mike Bloomberg
tweet: 2020 tested us, but @BloombergDotOrg worked tirelessly with partners around the world to recover and build a stronger future for all communities.  https://t.co/KOKjBTuov8  https://t.co/MQgfcfTbWN

name: Mike Bloomberg
tweet: Many would like to forget that 2020 happened—but there’s never been a year more important to learn from. name: Mike Bloomberg
tweet: We face the gravest educational crisis in generations. Many students, especially from low-income families, have lost a full year. We need states to run universal summer school - and we need @POTUS to push for it.  https://t.co/vokChV5mZc

name: Mike Bloomberg
tweet: Our School Streets initiative in partnership with @MayorofLondon & @FiaFdn empowers the public to fight air pollution & make school communities safer. Its findings can help improve children's health in London & around the world.  https://t.co/YPcBzNd2zO

name: Mike Bloomberg
tweet: Cities around the world are leading the way on ambitious solutions to COVID-19 and recovery, rebuilding local economies, addressing social injustice, and advancing climate goals -- and mayors convened to discuss promising solutions at #CityLab2021.  https://t.co/p0YpLSLgeI

name: Mike Bloomberg
tweet: New study from @WorldObesity shows 90% of #COVID19 deaths were in countries with high obesity rates, underscoring why we must continue to fight the obesity epidemic using healthy food policies to save & improve lives. #WorldObesityDay @WHO @BloombergDotOrg  https://t.co/Wemh8v921P

name: Mike Bloomberg
tweet: In a crisis, the public needs to be able to trust its leaders. name: Mike Bloomberg

name: Mike Bloomberg
tweet: Secretary-General @AntonioGuterres is right: Phasing out coal from the power sector is the single most important step to achieving our Paris Agreement goals. The Powering @PastCoal Alliance is helping to do just that.

name: Mike Bloomberg
tweet: His influence and good work - and the values it advanced - will far outlast him.

name: Mike Bloomberg
tweet: ...the influence he wielded and the insights he shared strengthened our nation in too many ways to count - most of them away from the spotlight he was content to let others have. Over the years I got to know him, I was among the legions who benefited from his wisdom.

name: Mike Bloomberg

tweet: The pandemic has shown just how important mayors are to the health of our communities. Today @BloombergDotOrg is announcing a major new investment in city leaders, because so much rides on their shoulders.  https://t.co/lkYnSH7V7G

tweet: Congratulations to @Citi and new CEO Jane Fraser on taking this important step, which will help us combat the climate crisis and build a clean energy future.

name: Mike Bloomberg

name: Mike Bloomberg
tweet: According to a new @UNFCCC report, countries must submit more ambitious targets ahead of #COP26 if we're going to achieve our Paris Agreement goals.  We must move the world beyond coal to reduce pollution and save ourselves from a climate catastrophe.

name: Mike Bloomberg
tweet: President Obama is exactly right: As we fight to bring an end to the COVID-19 pandemic, we need to keep up the urgency in the fight against the epidemic of gun violence.
